Tera
Reading file list must enable the "Storage" permission. Collecting log must enable the "Storage" permission. Reading IMEI info must enable the "Phone" permission. GO UPDATE
Network connection failed. Please try again later. Processing… Please wait. Google account authentication failed. User name Password Activation code Activate Forgot password or The activation code has been used. If your old Tera device is lost or broken, please lock it on %s before activation. Use Google account for activation Getting info on Google authentication from admin server failed. Enter user name & password. Tera must run on Google Play services, which are missing on your phone. Tera will not run unless you update Google Play services. Update Google Play services. Missing Google Play services permissions. Enter activation code. Incorrect activation code. Account authentication failed. Activation failed. The device has been registered. This device is not supported. Activation failed. Tera expired. Activation failed. Gateway Timeout: The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and did not receive a timely response from the upstream server. Tera is not activated on this device. Enter an activation code to activate Tera. Enable the "Phone" permission to activate Tera.
Access Cloud Settings Please choose available Wi-Fi connection or turn off "Sync" section in Tera settings to access cloud.
Open navigation drawer. Close navigation drawer. OVERVIEW APPS FILES SD card Add Shared Space SETTINGS BOOSTER ABOUT HELP

Pinned space usage reached %d%%. To avoid using up the space, note the app/file size to pin or unpin some apps/files. Insufficient pinned space Pinning system apps failed.

General Settings Sync Access cloud only when using Wi-Fi. Notification Failed/Restored connection Data upload complete. Select usage ratio to send notification. Select ratio to send notification. Local space usage Execute Download to run Change Account To change the account, Tera will log out your current account first. Continue? Send notification if local space usage reaches %s. Transfer data Transfer Data Transferring data will transfer the data from this current device to the Tera cloud for another device. Once the data transfer is done and another device starts to restore the data from Tera, this current device will automatically perform factory reset. I understand the above info and agree to perform related actions. Confirm Password Confirm your Google account password: Incorrect password. Please try again. Transferring… Data transfer may take some time, depending on the amount of data. Once the transfer is done, log in Tera on another device and select to restore the backup from Tera. Then this current device will automatically perform factory reset. Waiting for another device… All data is ready to transfer. Once another device starts running the restoration backup, the transfer process will auto start. Transferring data… While data is transferring, do not run any other apps or operations. Done Data on this current device has been successfully uploaded to the Tera cloud, and is being restored to another device. This current device will be reset soon. Factory reset will start in %s seconds. Transferring data failed. Sync Data Stopped This action cannot be executed because sync data is set to Wi-Fi only mode. Please tap "Sync Settings" to turn off Wi-Fi only or connect to available Wi-Fi network to continue. Use your mobile data plan to sync data? This action may incur additional costs, depending on your mobile data plan. You can also turn on Wi-Fi in settings page. Do not ask me again. Feedback Contact: Description Opinions: Phone: Timestamp: Collecting message Log collecting About Extra log for BA Extra log for BA has been enabled. No available email app and/or email account. Please at least install an email app and set a valid email account. Turn on mobile data for transferring data? Using mobile data connection while transferring data can result in additional charges. Please check your data plan with mobile carrier. Advanced Settings Allow pin/unpin apps Booster Boost apps to enhance app performance
Same as the current account. Changing account operation will not be performed. Change Changing account failed. Please try again or tap the Return key to quit. Choose Another Account Changing account must enable the Phone permission on Tera first. Tap the key on the right to continue.
Unable to access cloud data, because Google account authentication failed. Unable to access cloud data, because Tera account authentication failed. Unable to access cloud data, because Tera registration failed. Unable to get device status from management server.
Restore Contents If you choose \"Setup as a new device\", the previous backup of this device will be removed. If you choose this backup, all the contents will be transferred from the previous device to this one. The previous device will also be factory reset. This backup belongs to a locked device, so it might contain incomplete contents. Restore or setup as new device Setup as a new devices Restore from myTera Restore from backup Search for backup Preparing… Preparing for restoration process. During the restoration, all changes you have made won\'t be saved after reboot. Ready for restoration This restoration is ready, please tap "System reboot" to continue the process. Restoring… During restoration, please keep the network connected. Done The restoration has been completed. You can start using Tera service now. Exit Back Next Restore failed. System Reboot Restoring Tera Device storage space is not enough. Please delete some apps or files, and then retry again. Restoration failed Device storage space is not enough. Please delete some apps or files, and then restart the device to resume restoration. Exit Some critical data was not backed up successfully. So, you must do a factory reset and then choose a different backup or set up as a new device. Factory Reset Possible reasons may be an unstable/interrupted Internet connection, low battery, device issues, etc. If the problem persists, please contact %1$s. Retry Tera customer service 您選擇的備份已經使用中，請選擇其餘備份還原。
